name: 【SP #40】慢｜Slow
description:
【夢境故事】

我踏進神木深處，被一片黑暗壟罩，一絲微光透過裂縫灑落，映照出水面上綠苔的輝影。巨大的烏龜在椅上，它經歷了幾千載的歲月，智慧滲透其身，解開我心中的迷惘，點亮我的思維之花。如此奇妙的邂逅，讓我靈感湧現，眾多疑問迎刃而解，帶領我蛻變成更深邃的境界。

－

【Dream Story】

I stepped into the depths of the sacred grove, enveloped by an abyss of darkness. A faint glimmer pierced through the cracks, casting shimmering reflections upon the moss-covered surface of the water. There, perched upon a throne, rested a colossal turtle, bearing witness to countless millennia. Wisdom radiated from its very being, unraveling the perplexities that entangled my heart, illuminating the blossoming garden of my thoughts. Such a wondrous encounter stirred the tide of inspiration within me, effortlessly resolving a multitude of queries, guiding me towards a profound metamorphosis of the mind.
